comment: Always had issue with auto enhace feature, it adds a lot of tint to the photos. (it is funny that the thubnail for the enhancement looks good, but it is not what you get when you apply it). The new update has a weird UI and the placement of controls are not user friendly, and looks toy-ish. Liked the old interface with all the slider controls in one place.
key sentence: Interaction with the new UI: The user finds that the new update has a weird UI and notes that the placement of controls is not user friendly and looks toy-ish. This can be further broken down into their preference for the old interface where all the slider controls were in one place.
the function of activity: This activity allows users to navigate to library/memories/search, cast content, back up photos, favorite items, and access various editing and sharing options.
